messages.message:
Hi everyone :slightly_smiling_face: My name is Tamba. I am a new member of the PLEX team!

I am having trouble running Instabase locally and was hoping to get some help from this channel! The problem I’m facing is that the compile and build command (
```$ ppy compile all --as-docker --use-prebuilt && ppy start all --reload --as-docker```
) is not completing
(at least I don’t believe it is)
Can you please try `ppy start all --reload --as-docker`?
`api-server-apps` and `apps-servers` start and then nothing else
OK, I’ll give that a try
As far as I know the `--as-docker` flag is needed for both compile and run for using prebuilt images, otherwise it will try to start the service “local” to your machine and fail.

Sorry if I’m not understanding your suggestion, but I’m already using `ppy start all --reload --as-docker` , right?

I’m using `ppy compile all --as-docker --use-prebuilt && ppy start all --reload --as-docker`
Should I skip the `compile` part of the command?
Oops. you are understanding it correctly. I misread the initial copy and paste.
